name: Smith Lord
description: The master blacksmith of hell's forges, wielding a massive enchanted hammer and commanding the fires of creation and destruction.

abilities.name: Gear Up
abilities.description: Enhances all allies' armor by 10 for 4 turns. Does not affect self.

abilities.name: Molten Breath
abilities.description: Unleashes a devastating molten breath that deals 400 magical damage to all enemies.

abilities.name: Weapon Smithing
abilities.description: Forges enhanced equipment for an ally, boosting one of their random non-zero stats by 65% for 3 turns.

passive.name: Forge Mastery
passive.description: Gains +5 armor and +5 magical shield for each buff that alive allies have.
